source:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_00<tab>As the festivities of All Saints' Wake continue, the Impresario has another task for you.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ウルダハのダンチョーは、冒険者にさらなる提案をしたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_01<tab>Duly impressed with your efforts on his troupe's behalf, the Impresario would seek your aid with another All Saints' Wake tradition─the lighting of the traditional warding lanterns. Donning your costume, first speak to the shifty thespian and obtain a bomb digit for the task.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

守護天節の夜をさらに盛りあげるため、伝説のカボチャお化けを模したランタンに、点火してきてほしいというダンチョー。<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>を装備して、まずはウルダハの「怪しい旅芸人」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_02<tab>The performer entrusts you with some still-smoldering bomb digits that should serve as makeshift torches. Remaining in costume, scour the town for any warding lanterns that have gone dim and restore them to light.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_02<tab>怪しい旅芸人から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>を受け取った。ダンチョーの話では、ランタンはウルダハの町中に隠されている、ということだったはずだ。<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>を装備したまま、「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8F5101 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>」を使って点火しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_03<tab>You have succeeded in rekindling the flames of the warding lanterns. Inform the Impresario that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_03<tab>すべての<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8F5101 /var>に点火することができた。<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>を装備して、ウルダハの「ダンチョー」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_04<tab>The Impresario congratulates you on your efforts, and invites you to remain in town to enjoy the remaining festivities. The tone of his words suggests that the culminating act is yet to come...
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_SEQ_04<tab>冒険者に、朝まで町にいてほしい様子のダンチョー。曰く、まだまだお楽しみはあるというのだが……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_00<tab>While in costume, speak with the shifty thespian.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_00<tab>仮装して怪しい旅芸人と話す

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_01<tab>While in costume, use the bomb digits to light warding lanterns on the Steps of Nald.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_01<tab>仮装してナル回廊の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8F5101 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>を使い点灯

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_02<tab>While in costume, use the bomb digits to light warding lanterns on the Steps of Thal.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_02<tab>仮装してザル回廊の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8F5101 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>を使い点灯

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_03<tab>While in costume, speak with the Impresario.
target: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_TODO_03<tab>仮装してダンチョーと話す

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_000<tab>The night grows ever deeper; the streets teem with spooks and shades. Yes, everything is proceeding precisely according to plan... Hm?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_000<tab>しめしめ……。
みんなすっかりお祭り気分のようですね。
これなら、日の出まで持ちそうだ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_001<tab>Ah, you return. I am proud to say that the traditional observance of All Saints' Wake has made a rousing return to Eorzea, thanks in no small part to your efforts. Why, I daresay there might be a place for you in our troupe someday.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_001<tab>おや、夜を堪能なさっているようで！
それではもっと火を焚いて、町中を照らしましょう。
暗がりにひそむ魔物を追い払うつもりでね。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_002<tab>But the night is still young, and there is work yet to be done. You have, no doubt, observed the warding lanterns about the streets─those that bear a striking resemblance to the mask I wear. This mask, in turn, was crafted in the likeness of the Great Gourd, the patron spirit of All Saints' Wake, who descends upon the realm but once a year...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_002<tab>私の頭が見えますか？
これは、守護天節の時期に現れるという、
伝説のカボチャお化けを模したもの。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_003<tab>In any event, the lighting of these lanterns is yet another All Saints' Wake tradition, intended to keep evil spirits at bay. The chill autumn winds blow strong, however, and I fear that many a flame has been quenched. Were the streets to be plunged in darkness, who knows what terrors might descend upon the city? Heh heh heh...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_003<tab>同じようなランタンが、町のあちこちにございます。
「怪しい旅芸人」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>」を受け取り、
火が消えているランタンを点灯させてきてください。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_004<tab>I have entrusted to one of my men over there a supply of bomb digits. If you would be so kind, adventurer, procure some and set the dimmed lanterns aflame once more.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_004<tab>魔物が容易に手出しできぬよう、
ひっそり隠したランタンもありますゆえ……
たーーっぷり、時間をかけてお探しください。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_010<tab>Come to help us light lanterns, have you? Heh heh...your kindness is most appreciated. Here, these severed bomb digits should suffice for the task.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_010<tab>ランタンを点灯させたいって？
それじゃ、この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>」を持っておいきヨ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_011<tab>A word of warning before you depart: you'd be wise to stay in costume. After all, the specters lurking in the shadows aren't like to take kindly to an adventurer's meddlings.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_011<tab>点灯してないランタンは、5つくらいあるんじゃないカナ。
亡者の衣装をズルズルさせて、
探し回ってみるといい……ケケッ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_019<tab>I'd be wary of walking around like that if I were you, friend. The spirits of the dead walk the streets tonight, and they bear little fondness for the living...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_019<tab>おや、「<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>」は脱いじゃったのかい？
仮装をしてないイイコには、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>を渡せないナァ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_030<tab>(-Disembodied Voice-)<var 1A 02 /var>This one...still draws breath. Return to your bed, living one...lest you ne'er wake to see the dawn.<var 1A 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPA_000_030<tab>(-怪しい旅芸人の声-)ダメダメ、衣装を着てって言ったでしょ？
「<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>」を着たお仲間じゃないと、
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E84B701 /var>も燃えないヨ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_040<tab>It is good to see you safe and sound, friend. I feared you might have been spirited away by the Great Gourd. Heh heh heh...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_040<tab>ゲゲッ、ずいぶんお早いお帰りですね……。
本っ当に、全てのランタンに火を点けました？
ズルをなさってはいませんか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_041<tab>My troupers tell me that the warding lamps burn brightly once more. The citizens of Ul'dah have you to thank for keeping the demons of the night at bay.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_041<tab>コホン……失礼いたしました。
冒険者様が優秀だと、こちらも張り合いがありますね。
ええもう、本当に……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_042<tab>Yes, this has truly been an All Saints' Wake for the ages. But <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((there are still bells before the dawn)) ((night will fall anew)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((night will fall anew)) ((there are still bells before the dawn)) /var>)) /var>, and the most terrifying delights are yet to be seen. Do stay a while and enjoy the festivities, friend. Heh heh heh...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_042<tab>も、もちろん、お楽しみはまだありますとも！
宵の闇が明けるまで、町で騒いでいてください。
あなたのような方は特にね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_050<tab>What's the matter, friend? Have you misplaced your costume? I fear I cannot allow you to participate in the festivities unless you are dressed for the part.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW023_01173_IMPHEAD_000_050<tab>おやおや、「<var 28 ((Item)) F217DC01 /var>」はどうされました？
催しを心から楽しんでいただくためにも、
仮装をお願いいたしますよ。
